data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Puno, Peru that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Puno, Peru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Puno to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, please help the 196,568 believers in the state of Puno to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Puno, Peru.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Amawaka people might believe through him.
Father, let those from the 196,568 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Puno, Peru.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Puno, Peru with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
